com.example.forum.controller

Class ForumController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.forum.controller.ForumController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/questions")
 @Validated
public class ForumController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides Rest support for the Forum Application.

    • Field Summary

      private ForumReplyService replyService

      ForumController(ForumQuestionService questionService, ForumReplyService replyService)
      Uses constructor injection to load both ForumQuestionService and ForumReplyService.

    • Method Detail

      • createQuestion

        @PostMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumQuestionInfo> createQuestion(@Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                               @Valid ForumQuestionForm questionForm)
        This API creates Questions for the forum.
        Parameters:
        questionForm - This is used to restrict and validate the input. @Valid annotation will validate the input questionForm.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity type of ForumQuestionInfo - return value after creation of a question.

      • createReply

        @PostMapping(value="/{questionId}/reply")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumReplyInfo> createReply(@PathVariable(value="questionId")
                                                                                                                      java.lang.Long questionId,
                                                                                                                      @Valid @RequestBody
                                                                                                                      @Valid ForumReplyForm replyForm)
                                                                                                               throws RecordNotFoundException
        This API creates a Reply for the Questions.
        Parameters:
        questionId - Question ID for which reply will be created.
        replyForm - This is used to restrict and validate the input. @Valid annotation will validate the input replyForm.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity type of ForumReplyInfo - return value after creation of a reply.
        Throws:
        RecordNotFoundException - - Throws when record not found for the questionId.

      • getQuestionById

        @GetMapping(value="/{questionId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ForumQuestionReplies> getQuestionById(@PathVariable(value="questionId")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.Long questionId)
        This API fetches all the replies for a particular question.
        Parameters:
        questionId - Question ID using which the replies will be fetched.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity type of ForumQuestionReplies - return value contains replies for the questions.

      • getAllQuestions

        @GetMapping
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<ForumQuestionSummary>> getAllQuestions()
        This API fetches all the questions. This method is not using pagination. Further enhancement will be required if we need to do so.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity List of ForumQuestionSummary - contains summary of all the questions.
